expected.name: SWITCH-ON Basic Meta-Data
expected.description: Meta-Data record created, derived or imported by the SWITCH-ON project according to the SWITCH-ON Standard Information Model (SIM) for Meta-Data for the SWITCH-ON Spatial Information Platform (SIP).

contact.name: SWITCH-ON (Meta-Data Provider)
contact.description: The SWITCH-ON (Sharing Water-related Information to Tackle Changes in the Hydrosphere â€“ for Operational Needs) project prepared the Meta-Data Record of this dataset and made it available in the SWITCH-ON Spatial Information Platform Spatial Information Platform (SIP).

role.name: metadataProvider

taggroup.name: role
taggroup.description: Function performed by the responsible party (fixed group, standard codelist).

role.description: Party that collects, supplies and publishes meta-data about the resource. Person or organisation offering a meta-data catalogue that contains meta-data about the resource.

type.name: basic meta-data

taggroup.name: meta-data type
taggroup.description: SIP internal type of the Meta-Data Record (fixed group).

type.description: Type of the Meta-Data Record. "basic meta-data" refers to meta-data collected by switch-on according to the SIM meta-data schema. In fact, this meta-meta-data record refers to enclosing resource meta-data record.

taggroup.name: language
taggroup.description: The language(s) used within the resource or in which the metadata elements are expressed.  The value domain of this tag is limited to the languages defined in ISO 639-2.

standard.name: SWITCH-ON SIM

taggroup.name: meta-data standard
taggroup.description: Official standard on which the meta-data record is based (open group with some predefined tags).

standard.description: Meta-Data Record compliant to the Standard Information Model (SIM) of the Spatial Information Platform (SIP) of the EU FP7 project SWITCH-ON.
